class_notes: In this fourth semester course, students will continue to develop their language skills in Modern Hebrew. They will expand their vocabulary, strengthen their reading, writing and conversational skills, and learn new grammatical structures, such as final clause, passive participle, possessive suffixes, concessive conjunction, and gerund forms.
course_description: Prerequisite: Hebrew 201 or permission of instructor. Fourth in a series of courses designed to teach modern Hebrew with emphasis on grammatical structure and expansion of vocabulary; includes short stories, newspaper articles, and conversation.
